title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?

Madrid

Nishikori, Fonseca, Norrie advance on Thursday

April 24, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Thursday, when Kei Nishikori scored his 450th career win and Joao Fonseca began his European clay swing in winning fashion.

View all the Madrid Day 2 results below.

Results - Thursday, 24 April 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 96
Kei Nishikori (JPN) d Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) 64 36 63
Joao Fonseca (BRA) d [Q] Elmer Moller (DEN) 62 63
Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) d Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) 64 76(5)
Cameron Norrie (GBR) d [WC] Martin Landaluce (ESP) 67(4) 75 64
Reilly Opelka (USA) d [LL] Rinky Hijikata (AUS) 75 75
Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) d [LL] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) 75 26 41 Retired
Marcos Giron (USA) d Learner Tien (USA) 61 16 76(4)
[Q] Jacob Fearnley (GBR) d Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) 63 76(2)
Alexandre Muller (FRA) d David Goffin (BEL) 63 36 10 Retired
[LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN) d Zizou Bergs (BEL) 61 62
Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) d Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) 64 67(4) 64
Nicolas Jarry (CHI) d [Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) 63 62
Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) d [Q] Borna Coric (CRO) 46 64 75
Tallon Griekspoor (NED) d [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) 61 64
Damir Dzumhur (BIH) d Mattia Bellucci (ITA) 46 64 62
Luciano Darderi (ITA) d Quentin Halys (FRA) 64 64
